member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewFileActions.FileOpen(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the document from specified file, if file does not exist uses its directory as the initial directory of FileOpen dialog.
member.param: The name of file to open.
member.returns: Returns the opened document or null if the action was cancelled or there was an error while loading the document.

member.name: T:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane
member.summary: Represents the barebones control showing the preview of the associated document. To add functionality, other C1Preview components can be connected to this control.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.AddViewStateToHistory(C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum,System.String,C1.Win.C1Preview.ViewState)
member.summary: Creates a new ViewHistoryItem object with the specified ViewState; the newly created object is then added to the ViewHistory collection. The adding of the new state to history can be cancelled in the HistoryItemAdding event.
member.param: The HistorySavedActionsEnum value defining the user action associated with the new history item.
The caption of the new history item.
The ViewState structure representig the state of C1PreviewPane control (scroll position, zooming etc).
member.returns: The newly created ViewHistoryItem object, or null if the action was cancelled.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.AddCurrentViewStateToHistory(C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new ViewHistoryItem object with the current state of the preview pane; the newly created object is then added to the ViewHistory collection. The adding of the new state to history is cancelled if the Document property of the preview pane is null, or if the specified action is not saved according to the current value of the C1PreviewPane.HistoryOptions.SavedActions property. Also the adding of the new state can be cancelled in the HistoryItemAdding event handler.
member.param: The HistorySavedActionsEnum value defining the user action associated with the new history item.
The caption of the new history item.
If true, forces the adding of the current state even if it is equal to the state stored in the CurrentHistoryEntry.
member.returns: The newly created ViewHistoryItem object, or null if the action was cancelled.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.LockHistory
member.summary: Locks adding of new items to ViewHistory; a matching call to UnlockHistory() must be present.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.UnlockHistory(C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum,System.String)
member.summary: Unlocks adding of new items to ViewHistory; must match a previous call to LockHistory().
member.param: User action which was performed between the calls to LockHistory() and UnlockHistory().
Caption for the user action history item.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.CurrentVisitedDocumentIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of current visited document. Assigning of this property causes the go to another document stored in the VisitedDocuments collection.

member.summary: Gets or sets the VisitedDocument object.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.CurrentHistoryEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets the current history entry. The value should be in the ViewHistory collection of this C1PreviewPane object, and can not be null. Note that in some situations the history entry can not be changed (e.g. when the operation is attempted while the preview is changing its state). In those cases the set will be ignored.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.CurrentHistoryEntryIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of current history entry. Note that in some situations the index can not be changed (e.g. when the operation is attempted while the preview is changing its state). In those cases the set will be ignored.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.Busy
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag indicating whether the preview pane is currently busy. Some actions (especially those that could cause significant changes in the preview pane's state) raise this flag themselves, and cannot be performed when this flag was raised by another operation. This flag should be tested before attempting to change preview pane's properties or invoke methods on it.
member.value: The value of the Busy flag.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.StartPageIdx
member.summary: Gets or sets the 0-based index of the currently visible page. If several pages are visible, this property indicates the page with the most surface shown. When the property is set, the new start page's top left corner is aligned with the preview window's top left corner.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.PreviewScrollPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the top left corner of the preview area (the scroll position) within the preview window. The value is relative to the PreviewRectangle, not to the ClientRectangle. The value is independent of the ZoomFactor (i.e. setting the same values will scroll to the same logical position in the document at any zoom factor).

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.MouseMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mouse mode (zoom, selection etc.).

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.HideMargins
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether the user is allowed to hide/show margins by clicking the mouse in the gap between pages.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.HideMarginsAvail
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether horizontal or vertical margins can be hidden on the current document. Margins can hide if all pages have the same size. Additionally, horizontal margins can also hide if the preview has one column.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.HideMarginsState
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether horizontal and/or vertical margins should be hidden.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.ShowRulers
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether to show horizontal and/or vertical rulers.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.ShowPrintableArea
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether to highlight the printable area of the current printer.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.ShowPageOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether to show the original page outline (as a dashed line) when PrintingLayout is true and the printer paper does not match the original page size.

member.name: P:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.PrintingLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether to show the physical printing layout (printer page size and the location of the document pages' on the paper).

member.summary: Gets the print options.

member.summary: Gets or sets printer settings.

member.name: T:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.LayoutSection
member.summary: Helper class providing a section inside which the preview layout is suspended. Should be used to enclose fragments of code where several properties on which the preview pages layout depends are changed. Layout updating is suspended between the construction and disposing of the class instance. Sample usage: using (LayoutSection ls = new LayoutSection(previewPane)) { ..code... }.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.LayoutSection.#ctor(C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane,C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LayoutSection class.
member.param: The preview pane which is the owner of this layout section.
Action that caused this layout section (for history).

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.C1PreviewPane.LayoutSection.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the layout section. Updates the preview pane layout.

member.summary: Helper class providing a busy section. Usage: using (new busy = BusySection(previewPane)) { ..code... }.

member.summary: State before the HideMarginsState property is changed is saved in history.

member.summary: State before the ShowRulers property is changed is saved in history.

member.summary: State before the ShowPrintableArea property is changed is saved in history.

member.summary: State before the PrintingLayout property is changed is saved in history.

member.summary: State before the PrinterSettings property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.Layout
member.summary: State before any of the layout-related properties is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.ZoomMode
member.summary: State before the ZoomMode property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.ZoomFactor
member.summary: State before the ZoomFactor property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.Zoom
member.summary: State before any of the zoom-related properties is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.StartPageChange
member.summary: State before the StartPageChange property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.HyperlinkJump
member.summary: State before the HyperlinkJump property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.Scroll
member.summary: State before the Scroll property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.TextSearch
member.summary: State before the TextSearch property is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.Location
member.summary: State before any of the location-related properties is changed is saved in history.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentOpen
member.summary: State before a new document is opened is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, this option saves the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentReflow
member.summary: State before reflow of the current document is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, this option saves the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentChangeMargins
member.summary: State before margins on the current document are changed is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, this option saves the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentChangePageSettings
member.summary: State before page settings on the current document are changed is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, this option saves the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentAction
member.summary: State before any of the document-related changes occur is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, all document-related actions save the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.DocumentChangedAction
member.summary: State before any of the document-related changes (except the opening of a new document) occur is saved in history.
member.remarks: When triggered, all document-related actions save the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.C1Preview.HistorySavedActionsEnum.All
member.summary: State before any of the supported changes occur is saved in history.
member.remarks: Note that this option includes DocumentAction, which, when triggered, saves the current document, and thus may cause delays and/or increase memory consumption, especially in the case of large documents.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.PreviewPages.BeginChanges(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Begins a series of related changes to the pages collection, specifying the type of changes to occur. Should be followed by a call to EndChanges. Improves performance and provides consistency.
member.param: If true, the changes are assumed to be limited to adding new pages to the end of the list. Specifying this parameter as true may increase performance when creating long documents. Note: it is the caller's responsibility to ensure that if this parameter is true, the changes are indeed limited to appending new pages only. Otherwise, unpredictable results may occur.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.PreviewPages.BeginChanges
member.summary: Begins a series of related changes to the pages collection. Should be followed by a call to EndChanges. Improves performance and provides consistency.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1Preview.PreviewPages.EndChanges
member.summary: Ends a series of related changes to the pages collection. Should follow a call to BeginChanges. Improves performance and provides consistency.
